title: YouTube Music casting is currently broken on Chromecast, Google TV, Android TV devices
content:
It seems that Google’s music service, YouTube Music, is currently experiencing issues with casting music to Chromecast, Google TV, and Android TV devices.

more…

The post YouTube Music casting is currently broken on Chromecast, Google TV, Android TV devices appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: It appears that a widespread outage is currently affecting YouTube Music casting on Chromecast, Google TV, and Android TV devices.
